{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TEW-828DRU |revision=V1.0R |upc= |ean= |asin=B00TCU295S |price=279.99 |est_release_date=03/18/2015 |fcc_date=12/16/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=XU8TEW828DRU |ic_id=6337A-TEW828DRU |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GD16EWXC-12H |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amp;Skyworks;SE2623L;;3;,,, 5GHz Power Amp;Anadigics;AWL5911;;6;,,, 6GHz SPDT Switch;Skyworks;SKY13377;;3;,,, 3-lane 3-port PCIe Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TRENDnet828_2.4GHz_XXXX, TRENDnet828_5GHz_XXXX |default_ssid_regex=TRENDnet828_2.4GHz_[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$,,, TRENDnet828_5GHz_[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui=D8:EB:97 |oui_eth=D8:EB:97 }} {{TagLine|AC3200 Tri-Band Wireless Router}} : [http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-828DRU Product page] : [http://www.trendnet.com/press/releases/view.asp?id=2783 PR on ''TRENDnet''] 1300Mbps max. PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, 600Mbps
max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = ''3200Mbps'' class *While not really represented well in the infobox, this is a tri-radio device - all radios :(2x 5GHz [11an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [11bgn]) used are (''FullMAC'' arch. targeted) BCM43602s. :BCM43602 is supported in the mainline ''Linux'' kernel by [[brcmfmac]]. ===Specifications=== *AC3200 Tri Band Wireless Router :Three concurrent WiFi bands maximize device networking speeds :AC3200: 1300 Mbps AC1 + 1300 Mbps AC2 + 600 Mbps N bands *SmartConnect automatically migrates faster AC devices to :the highest performing WiFi AC band *Beamforming technology increases real-time performance by :directing stronger wireless signals to your specific location *Extreme performance 1 GHz dual core processor *SuperSpeed USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 share ports *Pre-encrypted WiFi for your convenience *Create isolated guest networks *All Gigabit wired ports :[http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-828DRU Product page] | [http://www.trendnet.com/support/supportdetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-828DRU Product images] :Availability: Available from retailers and other partners :Warranty: 3 year limited, MSRP: USD 279.99 ===Rewiews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32719-trendnet-tew828dru-ac3200-tri-band-wireless-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A @1GHz Dual Core :*RAM: 512MB - 2x 256MB (EM6GD16EWXC-12H) ?? :*Flash: 128MB :*WLAN 2.4GHz: 1x [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 ::''Skyworks'' SE2623L 2.4GHz power amps (x3) ::''Skyworks'' SKY13377 6GHz SPDT switch (x3) :*WLAN 5GHz: 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 ::''Anadigics'' AWL5911 5GHz Power Amps (x6) :*PCIe: ''PLX Technology'' PEX8603 3-lane, 3-port PCIe switch ===See also=== *[[TRENDnet TEW-804UB]] FCC ID: XU8TEW804UB 07/18/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-805UB]] FCC ID: XU8TEW805UB 03/27/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-806UBH]] FCC ID: XU8TEW806UBH 05/30/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-807ECH v1.0R]] FCC ID: XU8TEW807ECH 12/19/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-809UB]] - ''AC1900 USB Adapter'' [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32914-trendnet-unveils-ac1900-usb-adapter PR] *[[TRENDnet TEW-810DR]] FCC ID: XU8TEW810DR 10/17/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-811DRU]] FCC ID: XU8TEW1200AC 04/23/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-812DRU v1]] FCC ID: XU8TEW1750AC 12/17/2012 *[[TRENDnet TEW-812DRU v2]] FCC ID: XU8TEW1750ACV2 08/15/2013 *[[TRENDnet TEW-813DRU V1.0R]] FCC ID: XU8TEW813DRU 04/25/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-814DAP V1.xR]] FCC ID: XU8TEW814DAP 08/22/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-818DRU V1.0R]] FCC ID: XU8TEW818DRU 01/15/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-820AP V1.0R]] FCC ID: XU8TEW820-821 08/28/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-823DRU V1.xR]] FCC ID: XU8TEW823824 08/28/2014 *[[TRENDnet TEW-827DRU]] - ''AC2600 StreamBoost MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' [http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-827DRU PPage] :Quad-stream AC2600: 1733Mbps on 5GHz and 800Mbps on 2.4GHz :[[Qualcomm]] &1.4GHz dual-core processor, 2x USB 3.0 ports __NOTOC__
